message.content:
Subject: Notification of Departure from Company

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. It is with a heavy heart that I inform you of my decision to leave the company, effective immediately. After careful consideration and weighing various factors, including personal growth opportunities and career advancement prospects in other organizations, I have decided it is time for me to move on from [Company Name].

I would like to express my sincere gratitude for all the support, guidance, and mentorship you have provided during my tenure at the company. Your leadership has been instrumental in shaping my professional journey, and I am truly grateful for the opportunities that have come my way as a result of your faith in me.

As I embark on this new chapter in my life, I remain committed to maintaining open lines of communication with you and ensuring a smooth transition during my remaining time at [Company Name]. Please do not hesitate to reach out if there is anything I can assist you with or provide any information that may be helpful as we navigate through the change.

Thank you once again for everything, and I wish you continued success in your future endeavors.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
